ing: salt and ground black pepper to taste
des: "This quick and easy side dish has a nice and subtle sweet taste with a spicy after bite."
ins: Heat olive oil in a saucepan over medium heat; add mushrooms, onion, garlic, balsamic vinegar, Worcestershire sauce, salt, and black pepper. Bring mixture to a simmer and cook until liquid is 2/3 reduced, about 10 minutes; sprinkle with sugar. Cook and stir until sugar is dissolved, 1 to 3 minutes.
